    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cabecalho​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook workBook)
    Fills excel header with the strings below (String[] c) and bold format
    void chooseRules​(java.util.ArrayList<rules.Rule> rules)
    Invokes calculateThresholds(ArrayList result, ArrayList boolresult) for each position of ArrayList and considering the ruleType (0=godClass and 1=LongMethod)
    void fuelAllandBoolResults()
    Fills the ArrayList All with data like one of the metrics arrays (in this case "cyclomethod") the data copied to "all" are the same in all vectors, then fill in "all" the array with 5 integers in which each position corresponds to a metric Fills boolResults arrays with the same information that is equals in all metrics arrays and then initializes the arrays' boolean with "false".
    java.util.ArrayList<Metrics.Resultado> getAll()
    Returns an array with the Results of the metrics

    • ini

      public void ini() throws java.io.IOException
      initiates the main Central flow and calls all methods
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • chooseRules

      public void chooseRules​(java.util.ArrayList<rules.Rule> rules) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Invokes calculateThresholds(ArrayList result, ArrayList boolresult) for each position of ArrayList and considering the ruleType (0=godClass and 1=LongMethod)
      Parameters:
      rules - zero, one or two rules given by the user and created in class GUI
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • fuelAllandBoolResults

      public void fuelAllandBoolResults()
      Fills the ArrayList All with data like one of the metrics arrays (in this case "cyclomethod") the data copied to "all" are the same in all vectors, then fill in "all" the array with 5 integers in which each position corresponds to a metric Fills boolResults arrays with the same information that is equals in all metrics arrays and then initializes the arrays' boolean with "false".

    • putMethodID

      public void putMethodID()
      enumerates all array with a MethodID enumerates the BoolResultado arrays with MethodID to appear in the GUI

    • writeExcel

      public void writeExcel​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook workBook) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes to excel all the necessary information call cabecalho (Sheet sheet, XSSFWorkbook workBook) to fill the excel header
      Parameters:
      sheet - Excel sheet created when excel opens
      workBook - Excel book
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • cabecalho

      public void cabecalho​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet, org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook workBook)
      Fills excel header with the strings below (String[] c) and bold format
      Parameters:
      sheet - Excel sheet created when excel opens
      workBook - Excel book
